0110101010101000 0110010010110011 0 -> sum: 1100111101011011, cout: 0
1010110101001101 1000100101011001 0 -> sum: 0011011010100110, cout: 1
1011010010000010 0010001001011111 0 -> sum: 1101011011100001, cout: 0
0100001001110010 0000011000011110 1 -> sum: 0100100010010001, cout: 0
1011000111101101 0001001011001000 1 -> sum: 1100010010110110, cout: 0
1001110111001100 0001000100000101 0 -> sum: 1010111011010001, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
